basic.description: Introduction to algorithms: their definition, design, coding, and execution on computers. Intended for students who have no programming experience. All or most assignment work will be completed during lab time.
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Elements of Computing Science

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from APSC142;CISC101; CISC110.
One-way exclusion    May not be taken with or after: CISC121; CISC; CMPE at the 200-level or above.
